scripts.server:build: echo 'Starting build (this may take a few mins)...' && cmake -S server -B server/build -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release && cmake --build server/build --config Release --verbose --parallel 2
scripts.server:run: pnpm run server:run:linux || pnpm run server:run:windows
scripts.dev:local: turbo run dev --filter webview & pnpm server:run
